_header: When Phoebus fair with beams bright
_description: A song of impossibilities with lying refrains: ‘Than will my reuerend lady on me rew’ — six stanzas rhyme royal

Banna.First Lines:
Quhen phebus fair with bemis brichtIn to þe west at mornyng
                    makis repair…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Pulland doun sailis and landand at eildoun treThan will my
                    reuerend lady rew on me
